title: Sundaram Finance to revise interest rates - Economic Times
content:
1. Sundaram Finance to revise interest rates  Economic Times
  2. Sundaram Finance revises interest rates upwards on deposits for 2 & 3 years  BusinessLine
  3. Sundaram Finance raises interest rates on deposits  The Hindu
  4. Sundaram Finance effects upward revision of interest rate for deposits of 2-3 years  Times of India
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Chennai-based company, in a statement here said it has increased the interest rates offered to senior citizens to 6.40 per cent from 6.15 per cent on two year deposits, and 6.55 per cent as against 6.30 per cent on deposits with a tenure of three years.
